review: Simple, convenient, and easy to use. I love that I can be browsing through my Amazon Prime selection within seconds of sitting on my couch.
author: Noah

review: I am enjoying my Amazon Fire TV Stick.  It performs as advertised.  It took me a short while to catch on to the features of the remote and how to quickly find programming I want to watch.  I am now watching shows on my TV that I used to watch on my laptop.  This is a big improvement.
author: Scott R Graybill

review: It offers seemingly the same services as a Roku for a much cheaper price but I consistently have issues streaming Hulu where it will freeze and continue on with only the voice (if you look up this issue, I am not alone). Netflix works fine due to the buffer the service itself creates. I have done all of the suggested fixes to try to get it working but alas I have given up and ordered another Roku.
author: Andrew Hughen "B.S. Computer Science / B.A. Mathematics"

review: Easy to use, easy to hook up.

review: Program dropouts. Add I have comcast Blast internet.So far it's not worth it. Plus price drop after I purchased.

review: Excellent!Surpassed all expectations! Fire TV Stick installation is so easy!  The quality of streaming is incredible and without interruption -no buffering.  I purchased it for my husband for Fathers Day. He loves it and is enjoying it immencely.The Stick does everything expected and more.
author: Sunshine

review: Does NOT work with NetFlix.  Have tried every troubleshooting technique suggested on Amazon and on the user forum (clear Amazon Video, force stop, clear cache, delete data, unplug for 2 minutes, log out, log in, reset to factory settings, etc. etc. etc.  I have done all of the above multiple times.  Nothing works to get Netflix loading.  Netflix works on every other device in my home, so it is a Firestick problem, not a Netflix problem.  It worked for about a day, hence the 2 stars. If you are purchasing to use for Netflix streaming, beware.
author: HLM10028

review: Simple to set up, includes clear instructions, and is easy to use. My only regret is that I waited so long to enjoy my Amazon Prime Instant Video and Netflix on my big screen TV!
